alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 7:10PM MDT until June 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN CARTER COUNTY... At 709 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Lightning Flat, or 35 miles southeast of Broadus, moving east southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail, along with brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alzada and Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
